meanings.definition: Expressing or involving division into parts
meanings.sent1: The cake was cut into small partitives slices for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: She carefully organized the toys into partitives groups based on their colors.

meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the concept of fractions using partitives examples.

meanings.definition: Denoting a part or portion of something
meanings.sent1: He only ate a partitives piece of the delicious pie.
meanings.sent2: The book was missing a partitives chapter at the end.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated their victory with a partitives cheer.
meanings.sent4: The movie highlighted a partitives aspect of the character's personality.
meanings.sent5: She received a partitives amount of feedback on her presentation.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate a part of a whole
meanings.sent1: She took a partitives of the cake to share with her friends.
